p: As this is a preliminary review, the top 25 highly cited articles were utilized for each search. A sub selection of literature covering mental health implications of past pandemics were reviewed. Search terms included “mental health,” “psychiatry,” “epidemics,” “natural disasters,” “COVID-19,” and “SARSCoV2.” Google scholar and PubMed were used to search for primary and review articles pertaining to the search terms listed. Additionally, the World Health Organization, Centers for Disease Control, John Hopkins Resource Center, and the American Psychiatric Associations COVID-19 data and publications were reviewed in order to obtain a wider breadth of understanding when assessing the literature reviewed in this paper.
